Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. World Stage is set to release on October 30, 2025, bringing a new era to the iconic fighting game series from SEGA. Players can expect updated features and competitive modes on Xbox Series X and PC.

Gameplay and Visuals

The game showcases the classic Virtua Fighter art style, blending sharp character models with dynamic fighting animations. One of the highlighted characters is a blond fighter in a distinctive red and black jacket, posed in a ready stance, emphasizing the game's fo
title: Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. World Stage Release Date and Features

Killing Floor 3 returns with its signature blend of fast-paced first-person shooter action and gruesome horror. Players join the fight as Nightfall specialists, engaging in relentless battles against waves of mutated enemies in dark, atmospheric environments. The gameplay highlights an expansive arsenal, tactical co-op, and advanced enemy AI.

Gameplay and Visuals

Combat is fierce and visceral, with players wielding an array of weapons—including firearms and melee options—against pale, humanoid monsters. The environments are dark and confined, amplifying tens
title: Killing Floor 3 Gameplay Reveals Intense Co-op Action

Vlad Circus: Curse of Asmodeus is a point-and-click horror adventure from Indiesruption, confirmed to launch on August 25, 2025, for Xbox One, Xbox Series X, and PC. Players take on the role of Josef Petrescu, unraveling the secrets of a twisted town through pixel-art visuals and parallel timeline mechanics.

Gameplay and Visuals

title: Vlad Circus: Curse of Asmodeus Launches August 25, 2025
